text: Gu maaŋ muuŋgiap kha ndɨkndɨgar nde mbui fhu, nde Fhe Bakɨme buna guareŋ kakagi. Gu mba ndɨkndɨgar nde mbuav, kha buni khergiap, nde ndi mbai fhuvara. Gu khaŋ muuŋgi ne nzuav kha buni khergi. Nde Fhe Bakɨme buna guareŋ, nde ne kaŋgi. Fhe Bakɨme buna guareŋ, ne guigi buna thueŋ suaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
